content: this is a digital download and not an actual product inspired from the crochet mini dress that taylor swift wore in london final pattern is posted this has now been tested and updated with video links and images for assistance pattern details… tips on how to adjust sizing lots on images to assist with pattern creation there is a facebook group title fleeting obsessions patterns this page is for pattern owners only it is a place to share images of your creations and ask questions freely please join us 2 fleeting obsessions patterns | facebook materials needed 800 - 1500 yards depending on size size h 5 00 mm crochet hook or preference for this sample i used a 6 5 mm hook for maximum drape yarn needle scissors size 4 yarn used in images but any size will do may change amount of row needed sewing needle and thread stitch markers there is a coupon code in the pattern for future purchases please read all pattern notes - they are important and were included for specific assistance throughout the build if you have questions about the pattern please read through all notes first before submitting a request for assistance stitch guide us terms chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch when st counts appear in parentheses repeat single_crochet single_crochet cluster/granny stitch 3 double_crochet in the same space or a granny stitch double_crochet double_crochet this pattern was an inspiration from the dress seen online and is not to be considered an official pattern disclaimer ©fleetingobsessionsart2023 all information and photos are the sole property of fleeting obsessions art and krista mccloud do not copy sell or redistribute this pattern in any way items made by this pattern made be sold as long as pattern credit is given to fleeting obsessions art via any of the hashtags or links below watch out for us on any of our socials for tutorial videos and pattern assistance subscribe to our email mailing list for up to date stitch guides as well social media #fleetingobsessionsart #fleetingobsessionscrafts website https //fleetingobsessionsart squarespace com facebook fleeting obsessions | facebook tiktok @fleetingobsessionsart | tiktok instagram @fleetingobsessionsart youtube here now
